q1: Are they different from the other Madrid team?
a1: Yes they are two separate teams playing in the same city.
q2: When they play it’s a big derby
q3: Who wins most of the time in this derby?
a3: Historically, Real Madrid have had the upper hand over Atletico Madrid.
q4: How many times have Atletico Madrid won the league?
a4: the atletico from madrid won the league 10 times
q5: Do you think Atletico Madrid will ever merge with Real Madrid?
a5: I don't think that they will.
